headline.main: HITLER SPEECH RENEWS REICH'S FAITH IN VICTORY; Only Question in Berlin Is Direction of Decisive Drive -- Strength of Axis Is Held to Be Invincible

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Feb. 1 -- Last Thursday for the second time since the beginning of this year, Reichsfuehrer Hitler unqualifiedly proclaimed to the world his conviction that the Third Reich will achieve victory in this war in this year of 1941. In the official German view, moreover, this opinion is based upon positive factors without the realm of propagandistic expediency and the most important of which is the striking power of the titanic Teuton war machine.
